venue.address_2: Edgerton Center for the Performing Arts
venue.name: Sacred Heart University

item.description:
I'm currently attending Sacred Heart University and an interesting lecture event is going on Feb 22, 2012 Tucker Carlson and Eugene Robinson are coming to talk about the 2012 election. And they'll be a Q&A session during the event, the tickets are $35 each and the website I'll put at the bottom. Tell as many Ron Paul supporters as you can in Connecticut and descend on Sacred Heart University. Any other questions on directions you can call my cell phone at (860) 301-9665begin_of_the_skype_highlighting              (860) 301-9665      end_of_the_skype_highlighting or Tweet me @Infowarrior991 let's spread the word and get as many people as we can I'll be worth it. P.S bring your camera's as well to spread it virally Here's the website to buy tickets for the event and the phone number as well: 

http://www.sacredheart.edu/pages/41662_the_student_affairs_lecture_series_presents_eugene_robinson_and_tucker_carlson.cfm

(203)-371-7908begin_of_the_skype_highlighting              (203)-371-7908      end_of_the_skype_highlighting Edgerton Box Office
item.name: Sacred Heart University Lecture: Tucker Carlson & Eugene Robinson on the 2012 e
